admin.intro: Click here to display tournament settings.

form.cantUpdateEngineWhileRunning: You can't update the tournament engine while tournament is live.

actions.lockTooltip: Prevent additional people from entering the tournament
actions.openTooltip: Allow more people to enter the tournament

run.runningTooltip: Start tournament, users won't be able to register anymore
run.notRunningTooltip: Stop tournament, users will be able to register again
run.noEngineSpecified: No game engine was specified, can't start tournament until it's done
run.noPlayers: No players registered, there's no point in initiating the bracket
run.invalidTournamentEngine: The tournament engine specified is not available.
run.cantUnlockRunningTournament: You can't unlock registrations to a running tournament.

reporting.title: Reporting
reporting.describeReport: Please fill in the form and validate it in order to report the match.
reporting.warning: Clicking the confirmation button will unreport the match, permanently deleting any content (score, replays ...) related. This action can't be undone.
reporting.errorUnreportingMatch: An error has occurred when unreporting last match

errors.cantUnreportUnknownMatch: Can't report a match that does not exist for this bracket
errors.cantUnreportIncompleteMatch: Unable to unreport a match that has not been played yet
errors.nextMatchAlreadyReported: The next match has already been played, you need to unreport it first in order to be able to unreport this one
errors.notAllPreviousMatchesAreComplete: There are matches before this one that need to be reported before you can report this one
errors.alreadyReported: This match has already been reported. If you want to edit it you must unreport and then report it again
errors.numberlessMatchNotAllowed: No match number was provided, unable to report.
errors.invalidScores: Please use integers when reporting score
errors.nextMatchDoesNotExist: Could not find the next match
errors.winnerMustHaveHigherScore: Winning player must have a higher score
errors.insufficientPrivileges: You are not allowed do that
errors.errorUnreportingMatch: Service error. It can be temporary, try again in a few minutes and if the problem is still there you should get in touch w/ your admin or, if none is present, tweet the main dev (@ToodleTM).

swapPlayers.errorWhenGettingPlayersToSwap: You probably forgot to select one of the players to swap. If that's not the case, get in touch with the admin
swapPlayers.noSwappablePlayersFound: Player nicks do not match players partaking in that tournament
swapPlayers.title: Swap players

actions.multipleSeedTooltip: Here, you can upload a csv file (with commas as separators) the 1st line is the header and must contain properties names (like 'name, faction') rather than actual data. Column ordering does not matter but you should always have a 'name' column.
actions.cantRemovePlayerWhileRunning: Can't remove a player while the tournament is running!
actions.unableToChangeOrderWhileTournamentIsLive: Unable reorder players while tournament is live.

misc.links: Links to other related pages for your tournament

update.fail: Something went wrong updating this tournament.
